explains: adj. 踌躇的，犹豫的；摇晃的，蹒跚的；不太有效的，不太成功的
v. 衰退，衰弱；支吾地说，结巴，（嗓音）颤抖；蹒跚，犹豫，畏缩（falter 的现在分词）

sentences.en: The economy shows no signs of faltering.
"Peter," she said, faltering, "are you expecting me to fly away with you?"
sentences.cn: “彼得，”她犹豫着说，“你期待我和你一起飞走吗？”

sentences.en: She walked up to the platform without faltering.
